'''Special Four-Leaf Sigils''' are an [[Exploration]] mechanic found in [[Girdle of the Sands]], [[Sumeru]]. They are a type of [[Four-Leaf Sigil]] that can be moved within a certain range using [[Sorush (Gadget)|Sorush]]'s power. They appear red instead of yellow-and-green.
